name: Undercover Elf
description:
Take turns looking at pictures and giving a clue about what you see e.g. if you see a man you might say "I can see some arms"

The undercover elf is chosen at random and will have different pictures (not related to christmas) but must convince others he is seeing the same thing!

Can you guess who among you is undercover? 

Can you pass all 8 rounds without being suspected of being undercover?
